Design-01.Description: This is a solid upper accent hockey stick decal.

Design-02.Description: This is a solid upper accent hockey stripe with a longer front-end section.

Design-03.Description: This is an upper accent hockey stripe with a thin pinstripe (red in image) within the stripe. This can either be cutout or a secondary color.

Design-04.Description: This hockey stick accent stripe has an extended front end with a thin pinstripe (red in image) all the way around. The pinstripe can be cutout or an alternate color.

Design-05.Description: This upper accent hockey stripe has a thin pinstripe (red in image) running along the top. This pinstripe can be cut out or a 2nd color. It is up to you and the look you are trying to achieve.

Design-06.Description: This upper accent hockey stripe has an extended front end and a pinstripe (red in image) along the top. The pinstripe can be cut out or an alternate color.

Design-07.Description: This upper accent hockey stripe is a solid stripe with a pinstripe (red in image) running along the lower line of the stripe. The pinstripe can be cut out or a different color.

Design-08.Description: The upper accent hockey stripe is an extended solid stripe with a lower pinstripe (red in image) that can be cutout or an alternate color.

Design-09.Description: This is a strobed upper accent hockey stripe. This is a one-color design.

Design-10.Description: This is an extended strobed upper accent stripe. This is a one-color design.
